CustomField.description: Defines the City Code for this Geo data layer, being either a literal value (e.g. London) or the name of a field in the GeoJson file's feature properties (e.g. {City})
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the City Code for this Geo data layer, being either a literal value (e.g. London) or the name of a field in the GeoJson file's feature properties (e.g. {City})
CustomField.label: CityCode
